input.sentences: this woman traveled around the world .
however | she did it in eighty days .
there was a lot of planning involved for the trip .
lastly | she showed the concept of her venture .
output.sentences: The woman had traveled around the world to give her speech.
It had taken her 80 days to arrive at her destination.
Once she was there, it was time for the presentation.
Such a long trip had taken a lot of planning.
But lastly, she was ready to show the concept of her proposed venture.
